channel.title: Osi Model on Chris Short
channel.description: Recent content in Osi Model on Chris Short

item.title: Drawing: OSI Model
item.description: The Open Systems Interconnection model (OSI model) defines a concept where every function of a computing system resides at one of its seven levels. When people say, “Layer 3 routing” or “L7 load balancing” they are referring to the OSI Model. It is an incredibly handy tool for troubleshooting as it reminds you to check the system at each layer. The official documentation on the OSI Model can be found on the ISO site (yes, that’s confusing).
